item.title: Microsoft updates Skype for Linux
item.description: Or in other news, hell froze over ðŸ™‚ Some people complained about the new interface, so I’ll try to be agains the flow here and say that I actually quite like it. It’s not like skype for linux was ever active but since Microsoft aquired them I pretty much wrote off any updates. It seems I, like many others was wrong. Probably it has something to do with the new advertising features introduced lately…
